The Raviz Kovalam has put together the best romantic plan ever to keep up the love quotient. From specially curated staycations to unforgettable dinner dates that are bound to set hearts aflutter, we make it happen most lovingly!

More details @ http://bit.ly/2Snv1k5

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
